h2_title: How to Understand the Mid-to-Late Game Skills Trees
content: Finally, in the Strand menu, you'll find the spell A Pluck of Many, where you can send out multiple Duplicates to help you. The skills you can unlock here will increase the health of your Duplicates, along with their attack power, and more.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Best_Skills_to_Unlock.md', within the main section titled 'Best Skills to Unlock', specifically from the subsection 'How to Understand the Mid-to-Late Game Skills Trees'.
The content is as follows:
Finally, in the Strand menu, you'll find the spell A Pluck of Many, where you can send out multiple Duplicates to help you. The skills you can unlock here will increase the health of your Duplicates, along with their attack power, and more.
